document_data.name: Celemir
document_data.mainbody:
'''Celemir''' was an author from the city of [[Procampur]] in [[the Vast]].

Some time before [[1369 DR]], Celemir wrote ''[[Machinations of a Red Wizard]]'' about the [[Red Wizards of Thay]], under the name "Celemir of Procampur".{{Cite dungeon/75/Into the Nest of Vipers|66}}
